description: Learning how to solve linear equations is one of the most important skills you will need to know in math. For all future math courses knowing how to solve linear equations will be essential. This course is designed to not only teach you the basics of solving linear equations but to provide enough examples that you will be confident solving linear equations for the rest of your math career. The course is broken down into five sections with each section containing an overview instructional video, worksheet where each problem has a video showing you how to solve the problem and a quiz at the end to test your skills. This course should take you about a week to complete and is designed to be used not only as an instructional course but as and aide to help you with the course you are currently teaching.
title: Master Solving Linear Equations
